issue.title: Valkyrie Drops to the Ground due to incorrect delays in startup script

content.raw:
@scpeters Using delays instead of signals seems to be a major issue with startup. Is there any way to possibly see the tasks completed, so a manual startup can be used. Something similar to:

Setup 1 Complete, press enter to start Setup 2...
content.html:
@scpeters Using delays instead of signals seems to be a major issue with startup. Is there any way to possibly see the tasks completed, so a manual startup can be used. Something similar to:

Setup 1 Complete, press enter to start Setup 2...
